summary:
This release contains quite a few improvements and bug fixes, as well as some new features.

There is now a 'Legacy HUD' feature that will allow you to enable the old HUD stats bar while retaining the current menu bar or the old menu bar with the new HUD stats bar.

There is also a 'Native Dark Mode' beta feature that will allow you to enable a dark mode for the game. Please note, you'll need to disable the MHCT dark mode setting or disable the dark mode extension to prevent conflicts.
